content:
Rosarmia during the day made 386 beats on seven settlements of Zaporizhzhya region, there is the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure facilities

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

According to him, the Aviation Strill of the Russian Federation carried out on Malinovka.

“46 UAV attacked Guliaypole, Levadne, robot, small Tokmachka, Malynivka, Novoandriivka. 5 RSSV-supports came across a small toct and a robot. 334 Artudari was inflicted on the territory of Guliaypol, Small Tokmachka, Roboty, Novoandriivka, Malynivka, Levadny and Verbov, ” - said the head of Zaporizhzhya Ova.

Ivan Fedorov confirmed that there were 39 reports on the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.

As reportedArmyinform, Ukraine and the US will develop a strategy for cooperation in investigating Russian crimes against cultural heritage.
title: The enemy per day made 386 strokes in the Zaporozhye region, there is a destruction of housing and infrastructure
description: This was reported by the head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov. According to him, aviation ...
author: Army Inform
